text: @Theresano @GeneralHospital @watroswatros But then again can Sonny really take out anyone? He is the weakest mob boss I've ever watched on screen, all talk and no action, at this point he is just like a little puppy following this woman around with his tongue sticking out. No one seems to be afraid of him...SAD!

@valentinifrank @watroswatros @MauriceBenard @GeneralHospital I made the mistake of watching and I'm still sick. Please no more of this crap. What the heck is happening to Sonny? I can't stand it. I feel at this point Sonny would take out his whole family for Nina. No matter what as a parent your kids should always come first.

@GeneralHospital @watroswatros OMG watching these scenes with Nina and Sonny makes me want to throw up. I didn't think I could feel any worse about these 2. I guess after speaking to Dante Sonny has made his choice and it's not his son.

@GeneralHospital @watroswatros Oh Nina I can't even....She actually tried to get Brit to bash Carly by bringing up Jason when she was the cause of all that.She told Jax to let them get married so she could have Sonny.She needs to wake up & smell the coffee importer😉
@GeneralHospital @MauriceBenard Happy birthday Maurice. Stay safe brother.

@valentinifrank @MauriceBenard @watroswatros @GeneralHospital The worst part about it is how clueless she is, it's like..my wife didn't show up for the romantic date I planned for her but as a consolation I'll sleep with you.I'm  devastated about my wife wanting a divorce but to feel better let me kiss you and try to sleep with you again🤮

@valentinifrank @MauriceBenard @watroswatros @GeneralHospital The Nina fans keep talking about how she makes Sonny calm but that is not Sonny, with her he is this boring uninteresting shell of his former self. We have enough boring characters on the show. Sonny & Carly were hot. This pairing is so blah. She is like his stalker/babysitter.

@MauriceBenard @GeneralHospital Yeah I was hoping for that too becuz I love them together.They were my fav soap couple but I don't like the way he's is acting and I feel like Carly has no choice but to walk.Sometimes as women you have to respect yourself if your partner doesn't.I think that is what she's doing

@GeneralHospital @MauriceBenard Sonny is such a selfish a$$. He wants Carly to loose everything just because she can't get on board with him sleeping with Nina.I was hoping Carly wound change her mind and go after everything since he wants to be that way.I don't know what is happening to him but I don't like it

@valentinifrank @duelly87 @katey_macmullen @GeneralHospital OMG..Nina is such a user. She is trying to manipulate Willow to get access to Wiley. Look how nice and pitiful she is trying to be when not too long ago she was gloating about Willow not being able to lie on the stand not to mention how she treated her when she was a teacher

@dezzydoesthings @GeneralHospital @MauriceBenard I totally agree. The actors keeping saying how much they are enjoying this storyline but I thought they were making the show for the audience not themselves. The majority of us are not happy.

@GeneralHospital @MauriceBenard On a side note she doesn't realize Ava has ulterior motive and is using her. I don't like Ava but I hope it works and she gets Avery, Carly gets Donna and Sonny looses everything as he clearly is not thinking about his kids.

@GeneralHospital @MauriceBenard Nina needs to wake up and have some self respect. The man is drinking and acting crazy because his wife is divorcing him, shouldn't that tell you something? If he truly wanted to be with you he wouldn't care if Carly wants a divorce.

@tamj14 @valentinifrank @MauriceBenard @wesramsey @GeneralHospital I hear you. Even if they don't like Carly what about what Nina did to Sonny's sweet innocent little girls? They thought that their father was dead and suffered and now what.. she is going to become their stepmother? I changed the chanel and won't be watching for awhile.

@tamj14 @valentinifrank @MauriceBenard @wesramsey @GeneralHospital Not to mention what she did to Eva because she slept with her husband and now she thinks it"s ok to sleep with someone else's. She can see Sonny went all out to get his wife back...not her and yet she sleeps with him? She has no shame or self respect.

@LailahMahara @GeneralHospital Thank you for the correction but um.. did she not paralyze Ava and forced her into labor by drugging her and then kidnap Avery? Again the same innocent child she made suffer thinking her father was dead.

@LailahMahara @GeneralHospital I'm not asking about the damage Nina did to Carly, I'm talking about all the damage done to 2 innocent children and anyway I'm referring to the current storyline not living in the pass.

@GeneralHospital Why is everyone encouraging this woman to go after Carly's husband?
She needs to pay for the damage she cause but instead she keeps winning?  What about the babies she hurt by keeping their dad from them for 9 months? Disgusting!!!
